name: First Person View - POV
description:
Creates "First Person View" images.
Sometimes it's easy to achieve a look but many times you'll have to be accurate with the wording (prompts)!! /check the prompts on the exaple images!
If the AI is struggling to get the view, you will get 3rd person view images instead!

...I plan to train it more/differently to get more poses to work, so this is only the 0.5 version!

meta.prompt:
a woman is opening a tent door apart with her hand, the background is ocean,
intricate details, modelshoot style, dreamlikeart, dramatic lighting. 8k, highly detailed, trending artstation,
FPV
